rules_text:
[i](As a Siege enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it's defeated, exile it, then cast it transformed.)[/i]
When The Battle of Scarif enters, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature, land, or Vehicle card from among them, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
rules_text2:
This artifact enters tapped.
{2}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor_text2: [i]“Make ten men feel like a hundred.”[/i]
